data.message: YO.. my behavior is reckless and disturbin I'll strap your kid in the car seat upside down doing 95 on the highway while I'm high and swervin just to see what it's like to see him cry I can't tell you why I am the way I am must've been because my mom threw  me in the microwave when I was a baby for a few seconds and set the shit on high. Ever since then my consciousness has been severed from reality fuck immortality because I'm not afraid to die you punk fuck fucks are the ones to duck duck when bullets start whizzin by when I'm running to the shit with my hands in the air like it's a mother fuckin party fuck a fight  I wanna stab you with a goddamn knife your friends can't hold me back and neither can this bacardi so what's up is this not what you expected I spit poison everyone on this site longer than thirty seconds has already been infected there's nothing you can do or say that will remotely even hurt me ...Im fuckin cursed plus i got addison's I'm a walkin disease. If yall got shit to say about my future record I'm huntin your kids down while their sleepin and drillin em in the fuckin head with a black and Decker..... I got more shit I can do this all day but gotta go shout out to shady just bought your slim shady lp love still don't give a fuck and 97 bonnie and Clyde I'm your biggest Stan lol like this shit if you think I got skill peace shady fans
